## DropdownPropsInternallyControlled type

Props for the `Dropdown` component when the open state is controlled internally by the component. In this case, the `isOpen` and `onRequestOpenChange` props should not be provided.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DropdownPropsInternallyControlled = DropdownPropsBase & {
    isOpen?: never;
    onRequestOpenChange?: never;
};
```
**References:** [DropdownPropsBase](./dropdown-menu.dropdownpropsbase.md)
